text: 22:5 Aposel 9:2Godɨn ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim ko Judan kotɨn aven itir gumazir aruaba bar nan arazibagh fo, me dar gun ia mɨkɨmam. Me Judan Damaskusɨn itir en darazi bagha osirizir akɨnafariba na ganɨngi. Ezɨ kɨ ghaze, kɨ gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba itir Tuavir Kamɨn gɨn zuiba, kalabusbar mɨn me inigh Jerusalemɨn izɨva, mɨzaziba me danɨngam. Egha kɨ bizir kam bagha Damaskusɨn ghu.”
